T02D3587:218a-1: a'a rya ma h'a sa ha sras pra marda n'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3587:218a-3: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3587:218a-4: 'phags ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3587:218a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas sna tshogs padma dang
T02D3587:218a-6: zla ba la bh'um yig las byung ba'i stong chen
T02D3587:218a-7: mo rab tu 'joms par bdag nyid bsgom par bya
T02D3587:218a-8: ste / sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig pa /
T02D3587:218a-10: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na ral gri dang /
T02D3587:218a-12: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D3587:218a-13: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3587:218a-15: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la tsho gzhon zhing sgeg pa'i sku nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3587:218a-16: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can padma dang
T02D3587:218a-17: zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dang ldan pa'o
